txt.en: Saruman's army has come to Helm's Deep. The wall must be held lest the fortress fall.
The enemy's assault wanes. There is precious little time to fortify your defences.
[placeholder] Commanders Defeated
Aragorn calls out, 'Prepare yourself, our enemy approaches! They have catapults!'
[placeholder] Banners Burned
'Good, you've come. Be ready to fight with your all, for we defend all Rohan holds dear.'
<rgb=#FF0000> Aragorn has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Eómer has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Legolas has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Gimli has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Gamling has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
Defend the Deeping Wall
Eómer calls out, 'The battle will soon be rejoined. They come again! More siege approaches!'

The full weight of Saruman's army prepares to crash down upon the valiant defenders atop the ramparts of the Deeping Wall.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Commander defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Soldier defeated
- Banner burned
<rgb=#FF0000> The enemy has overrun your position. You have lost.</rgb>
The enemy is massing and preparing his assault. Ready your defences!
Aragorn, Legolas, Gimli, Gamling and Eómer must survive
The Deeping Wall
[placeholder] Soldiers Defeated
'What wonderous caverns! This is a place I could stand against every Orc there is. Let them come, I say!'
